titles.title: A resolution recognizing and supporting the goals and ideals of National Medicolegal Death Investigation Professionals Week.
A resolution recognizing and supporting the goals and ideals of National Medicolegal Death Investigation Professionals Week.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the goals and ideals of National Medicolegal Death Investigation Professionals Week.
